title: A Structural Equation Modeling Approach to Understand User's Perceptions of Acceptance of Ride-Sharing Services in Dhaka City. (arXiv:2210.04086v2 [stat.AP] UPDATED)
abstract: This research aims at building a multivariate statistical model for assessing users' perceptions of acceptance of ride-sharing services in Dhaka City. A structured questionnaire is developed based on the users' reported attitudes and perceived risks. A total of 350 normally distributed responses are collected from ride-sharing service users and stakeholders of Dhaka City. Respondents are interviewed to express their experience and opinions on ride-sharing services through the stated preference questionnaire. Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) is used to validate the research hypotheses. Statistical parameters and several trials are used to choose the best SEM. The responses are also analyzed using the Relative Importance Index (RII) method, validating the chosen SEM. Inside SEM, the quality of ride-sharing services is measured by two latent and eighteen observed variables. The latent variable 'safety & security' is more influential than 'service performance' on the overall quality of s

Abstract: This research aims at building a multivariate statistical model for assessing users' perceptions of acceptance of ride-sharing services in Dhaka City. A structured questionnaire is developed based on the users' reported attitudes and perceived risks. A total of 350 normally distributed responses are collected from ride-sharing service users and stakeholders of Dhaka City. Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) is used to validate the research hypotheses. Statistical parameters and several trials are used to choose the best SEM. The responses are also analyzed using the Relative Importance Index (RII) method, validating the chosen SEM. Inside SEM, the quality of ride-sharing services is measured by two latent and eighteen observed variables. translated_title: 结构方程模型方法研究Dhaka市用户对顺风车服务接受度的认知
translated_abstract: 本研究旨在建立一个多元统计模型，评估Dhaka市用户对顺风车服务接受度的认知。研究根据用户报告的态度和风险认知开发了结构化问卷。共收集了350个来自Dhaka市顺风车服务用户和利益相关者的正态分布回答。通过确定偏好问卷采访受访者，以表达他们对顺风车服务的体验和意见。采用结构方程模型（SEM）验证研究假设。使用统计参数和多种试验选择最佳SEM。应用相对重要性指数（RII）方法纠正SEM。 在SEM内，通过两个潜在和十八个观察变量来衡量顺风车服务的质量。潜在变量“安全与保障”对整体质量的影响大于“服务表现”。
tldr: 本研究使用结构方程模型探究Dhaka市用户对顺风车服务的认知，结果表明用户对安全和保障的关注程度高于服务表现。
en_tdlr: This study utilized the structural equation modeling approach to investigate users' perceptions of ride-sharing services in Dhaka City, finding that users prioritize safety and security over service performance.
